english.segment1: Bayonets to Insurgents. Lurking in my veins. My DNA, red template. Saluting my dark angel dragnet
english.segment2: I returned my cement shoes. Cashed in my sadness. I dont intend to sleep with the fish
english.segment4: Cancel my ticket booked to fire. Choirs of angels sing my name. Machete to that destination. New Destiny will curse the flame
english.segment5: The terror of the daylight. It once consumed me. My undead devious ways. The champion of getaways
english.segment6: This hallowed vaccination. This sacred pure attraction. In you Im now just a..
english.segment9: Cancel that flight into oblivion. Your ship now has an open seat. Enjoy those sips of sour poison. While I sit back and watch it rain
english.segment11: And say hello to death for me..
